BOMBDB.original: Placed a Bomb
BOMBDB.translated: 炸弹已安置

BOMBDB.original: One of your crew has stolen the armored vehicle. Make your way to the ~Y~rendezvous point.~S~
BOMBDB.translated: 你的一名同伴偷走了装甲车，去~Y~会合点~S~会合。

BOMBDB.original: You each have some explosives. Head out to the ~Y~docks~S~ in Broker.
BOMBDB.translated: 你们每个人都有一些炸药，前往位于Broker的~Y~码头。~S~

BOMBDB.original: The ship has been destroyed. The rival operation is no more.
BOMBDB.translated: 船已被摧毁，敌方行动无法进行了。

BOMBDB.original: Bombs will detonate in ~1~...
BOMBDB.translated: 炸弹将于~1~秒后爆炸...

BOMBDB.original: The bombs have been placed. They will detonate in 60 seconds. Get off the ship.
BOMBDB.translated: 炸弹已安置，炸弹将于60秒后引爆，快离开这艘船。

BOMBDB.original: The bombs have been placed. Everyone needs to disembark to trigger the explosion.
BOMBDB.translated: 炸弹已安置，需要所有人下船才能引爆炸弹。

BOMBDB.original: One bomb is in place. Get the other to the second weak spot.
BOMBDB.translated: 已安置一个炸弹，带另一个炸弹去第二个引爆点。

BOMBDB.original: The ~B~vehicle~S~ is stopping, steal it.
BOMBDB.translated: 那辆~B~载具~S~已经停了, 偷走他。

BOMBDB.original: One of you must drive the ~B~armored vehicle~S~ to the rendezvous point.
BOMBDB.translated: 你们中的一个人必须将~B~装甲车~S~开到会合点。

BOMBDB.original: ~R~The convoy has reached its destination. You failed to steal the explosives.~S~
BOMBDB.translated: ~R~车队已经达到目的地，你没能及时偷走炸药！~S~

BOMBDB.original: ~R~You've destroyed the explosives.
BOMBDB.translated: ~R~你摧毁了炸药！

BOMBDB.original: There are enemy snipers somewhere on the boat, someone should take up a sniping position and keep watch.
BOMBDB.translated: 船上某处有敌方的狙击手，我们需要一个人占领狙击位置并瞭望。

BOMBDB.original: Take the vehicle back to the ~Y~rendezvous point.~S~
BOMBDB.translated: 将载具开回~Y~会合点~S~。

BOMBDB.original: The helicopter has been destroyed. Find alternative transport to get to the ~Y~docks.~S~
BOMBDB.translated: 直升飞机已被摧毁，现在寻找其他交通工具去~Y~码头~S~。

BOMBDB.original: Go back to the ~Y~rendezvous point.~S~
BOMBDB.translated: 回到~Y~会合点~S~。

BOMBDB.original: To reach one of the bomb sites you will need to access the cargo hold from the ship's galley.
BOMBDB.translated: 要到达其中一个爆炸点，你需要从船上的厨房进入货舱。

BOMBDB.original: Wait here for the rest of your crew to arrive.
BOMBDB.translated: 在这里等待你的同伴到达。

BOMBDB.original: Find the convoy. Steal the ~B~armored vehicle.~S~
BOMBDB.translated: 找到车队，然后偷走~B~装甲车~S~。

BOMBDB.original: Place the explosives at the ~Y~weak spots~S~ on the ship.
BOMBDB.translated: 将炸药安置在船上的~Y~易爆点~S~。

BOMBDB.original: Drive this thing to the ~Y~rendezvous point.~S~
BOMBDB.translated: 将它带到~Y~会合点。~S~

BOMBDB.original: If you damage the ~B~armored vehicle~S~ enough it will stop and you can steal it.
BOMBDB.translated: 如果你将~B~装甲车~S~破坏到一定程度，装甲车就会停下来，然后你就可以偷走他。
